name: @bobfrankston/gcal
description: Google Calendar CLI tool with ICS import support

scripts.prerelease:local: git add -A && (git diff-index --quiet HEAD || git commit -m "Pre-release commit")
scripts.release: npm run prerelease:local && npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:local: npm run prerelease:local && npm version patch && npm publish --access public --ignore-scripts

author: Bob Frankston
